definitions.definition: Someone who routes or directs items from one location to another.
examples: The router directed the movement of the company's trucks.

definitions.definition: ( telecommunications ) Any device that directs packets of information using the equivalent of Open Systems Interconnection layer 3 (network layer) information. Most commonly used in reference to Internet Protocol routers.

( Internet ) A device that connects local area networks to form a larger internet by, at minimum, selectively passing those datagrams having a destination IP address to the network which is able to deliver them to their destination; a network gateway .
examples: The router was configured to forward packets outside of a certain range of IP addresses to its internet uplink port.

definitions.definition: ( electronics , electronic design automation ) In integrated circuit or printed circuit board design, an algorithm for adding all wires needed to properly connect all of the placed components while obeying all design rules.

main_definition: Someone who routes or directs items from one location to another.
secondary_definitions: ( telecommunications ) Any device that directs packets of information using the equivalent of Open Systems Interconnection layer 3 (network layer) information. Most commonly used in reference to Internet Protocol routers.

( Internet ) A device that connects local area networks to form a larger internet by, at minimum, selectively passing those datagrams having a destination IP address to the network which is able to deliver them to their destination; a network gateway .

( electronics , electronic design automation ) In integrated circuit or printed circuit board design, an algorithm for adding all wires needed to properly connect all of the placed components while obeying all design rules.

definitions.definition: A power tool used in carpentry for cutting grooves .
examples: He made an attractive edge on the table with a router .

definitions.definition: A plane made like a spokeshave , for working the inside edges of circular sashes .
A plane with a hooked tool protruding far below the sole , for smoothing the bottom of a cavity .
